translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

Finding myself authorized by the Superior Commander of the Vanguard Forces Command and garrisoning the points of Três Forquilhas, Rio Verde, and Torres; and finding it my duty to inform Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency Torres for better arrangements with Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency Island of Santo Antônio, to fire five shots so that Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency José Joaquim Cabeleira, who can well inform Your Excellency.

God preserve Your Excellency

Camp at Três Forquilhas on March 8, 1839.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Antônio Elzeário de Miranda e Brito, President of the Province.  
Paulo Pereira da Silva Alano.
